about_the_game:
Bean Climb - A hard torture during a dark night. You are a bean that got intentionally thrown out of a jelly bean packet. You're not going to give up right? It's time to overcome all the hard obstacles that you will face, it's not going to be easy, at times you are gonna feel unmotivated, but you have to do it...

You may ask, why? Why overcome the obstacles? Well, while sweating and climbing, the bean will explain everything to you :)

Gameplay:


  • Chargeable jump
Charge your jump according to how far, or how high you have to jump.

  • No air control
Remember you're just a bean, you're barely moving on the ground, so forget about moving mid-air.

  • Careful on the steep slopes
Do you still remember that you are just a bean? Because steep slopes, will make you slide.


By the way, I believe in you! You can do it! You may sweat, you may cry, but you got this!

Bean Climb - A hard torture during a dark night. You are a bean that got intentionally thrown out of a jelly bean packet. You're not going to give up right? It's time to overcome all the hard obstacles that you will face, it's not going to be easy, at times you are gonna feel unmotivated, but you have to do it...

You may ask, why? Why overcome the obstacles? Well, while sweating and climbing, the bean will explain everything to you :)

Gameplay:


  • Chargeable jump
Charge your jump according to how far, or how high you have to jump.

  • No air control
Remember you're just a bean, you're barely moving on the ground, so forget about moving mid-air.

  • Careful on the steep slopes
Do you still remember that you are just a bean? Because steep slopes, will make you slide.


By the way, I believe in you! You can do it! You may sweat, you may cry, but you got this!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 730 or AMD R7 240
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 730 or AMD R7 240
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Bean Climb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 730 or AMD R7 240
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Bean Climb - A hard torture during a dark night. Face all the hard obstacles, and make it to the top. It's not going to be easy, but jump by jump, you're hopefully going to make it. Just don't fall down...
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
